text: Masina achumba oibanina Christtagi ee-nadi kayagi matik amukka henna thabak pangthokkani! Lomba naidaba Thawaigi mapanna Ibungona masamakpu mapungphaba iratpot oina Tengban Mapuda katpire. Eikhoina ahingba Tengban Mapubu thougal touba yananaba Ibungogi ee-na eikhoigi achum aran khangba pukningbu kanadaba laininggi oiba chatnabisingdagi sengdokpigani.
